meanings.definition: To throw or cast incorrectly or inaccurately.
meanings.sent1: She misthrown the ball and it landed far from the target.
meanings.sent2: He misthrown the dart and missed the bullseye.
meanings.sent3: The magician misthrown the card, making it disappear into thin air!
meanings.sent4: Her words were misthrown into the heated argument, causing more chaos.
meanings.sent5: The chef misthrown the pancake batter, creating a messy splatter on the stove.
